body_html: Hm, if I'm not mistaken, stft/frame/strided_slice is from this line. Axis is always -1 when called from tf.contrib.signal.stft, so this boils down to tf.range(tf.rank(x))[-1].
body_text: Hm, if I'm not mistaken, stft/frame/strided_slice is from this line. Axis is always -1 when called from tf.contrib.signal.stft, so this boils down to tf.range(tf.rank(x))[-1].
body: Hm, if I'm not mistaken, `stft/frame/strided_slice` is from [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/signal/python/ops/shape_ops.py#L114). Axis is always `-1` when called from `tf.contrib.signal.stft`, so this boils down to `tf.range(tf.rank(x))[-1]`.
